TITLE: SSNoC
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Καλώς ήρθατε στο Επιβιώσιμο Κοινωνικό Δίκτυο σε Τσιπ
USERNAME_ERROR_LENGTH: Username must be at least 3 characters long
PASSWORD_ERROR_LENGTH: Password must be at least 4 characters long
ERROR_GENERIC: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERROR_USER_DEACTIVATED: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact an administrator
ERROR_USERNAME_TAKEN: The username already exists. Please enter a different username.
ERROR_BAD_REQUEST: Bad request. An error happened while trying to update
ERROR_ACCESS_KEY: No user found matching your access_key
ERROR_NO_USERS_FOUND: No users found for your call
ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED: You don't have access to this resource
ERROR_AUTHOR_NOT_FOUND: The author of the message could not be found.
WELCOME_PARAGRAPH: This is a Survivable Social Network on a Chip (SSNoC) which can help you in emergency. The first thing you'd better do is to share your status to let others know the situation.
OK_EXPLANATION: I am OK, I do not need help.
HELP_EXPLANATION: I need help, but this is not a life threatening emergency.
EMERGENCY_EXPLANATION: I need help now, as this is a life threatening emergency!
UNDEFINED_EXPLANATION: The user has not provided their status yet.
HOW_TO_SHARE_STATUS_STEP_1: Step 1: Elect to share status in the main page
HOW_TO_SHARE_STATUS_STEP_2: Step 2: Select one from the set of statuses in the dropdown
PERFORMANCE_INPUT_LABEL: Enter duration to run test (in seconds)
